Index >  Addons >  Addon.Webcam.CloseSource

Addon.Webcam.CloseSource()

Description

Closes the current webcam Data Source.

Syntax

.Addon.Webcam.CloseSource();

Return value

bool

true indicates success. false indicates failure.

Example

function StopCapture() {
    if (DWObject) {
        DWObject.Addon.Webcam.CloseSource();
    }
}

See Also

Addon.Webcam.CaptureImage()
